name: ContentFeed
short_description:
The ContentFeed control provides developers with a way to quickly set up and reuse repeated blog data.  Just give the control your data, tell it what columns to look for, and set up any styles you want, and the ContentFeed control will display blog feeds for your main page, comments for individual blog posts, or any other content that is repeated and has a similar format!

The ContentFeed control allows for sections of Content that include a Header, the main Content section, a link to other content, and a Footer.
summary: .NET Custom Repeater Control for Blog Content (teaser feeds, comments)

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: Blogging
